name: Time Flies (and sometimes it crawls)
description:
Hi! Thanks for checking this project out! You look amazing! 

This is our entry (myself and Sal86) in the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam! This is the first time either of us has entered a game jam and the week-long deadline, although a bit tight, was a great challenge! 

The theme for this Jam was Rewind and so we put our heads together and came up with "Time Flies (and sometimes it crawls) - A short game involving our main character's escape from Death's time hordes, using Rewind Pills to stay young. 

We tried our best to create all the artwork ourselves, but we have used some assets for backgrounds and music. All artists have been credited in-game, and thanks to everyone who made their assets available for us to use! Special thanks to seqtet for her help too! 

We hope you enjoy it, we had a blast making it, and any comments are always welcome! :) 

(Windows and Mac versions available.)
